alert.note: Alert for Ascension; Livingston; St. James; St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 27 at 3:27PM CDT until August 27 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern St. John The Baptist Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Central Ascension Parish in southeastern Louisiana... St. James Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southeastern Livingston Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 327 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Whitehall, or 13 miles east of Gonzales, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Reserve, Laplace, Gramercy, Lutcher, Sorrento, French Settlement, Edgard, Convent, North Vacherie, Garyville, Wallace, Whitehall, and Killian. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 181 and 204. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Ascension; Livingston; St. James; St. John The Baptist
